title: Microbial cities in space: Risks and opportunities for astronauts

title: Trump may visit Ireland in September, ambassador says
desc: US President Donald Trump may visit Ireland in September during the Irish Open golf tournament, the US Ambassador to Ireland has said.

title: UK asylum claims drop slightly in 2025 as small boat arrivals rise by 13%
desc: Some 100,625 people claimed asylum in the year to December and about 40% of these arrived by small boats, figures show.
